entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of showers. Low 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers early this evening. 40 percent chance of showers near Boston Bar. Snow level lowering to 1200 metres this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 16.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of showers near Boston Bar. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High 16. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
